section.p: A small bottle is bobbing in the water nearby. You pick it up, pull out the cork, and take the paper from inside. On it, a message reads, 'Don't open the bottle. And whatever you do, don't read this message.'
Instantly, you drop the bottle and its contents, terrified you may have incurred some kind of curse, but nothing seems to have happened. Puzzled, you return to your ship.
Later, the tide rises, and refloats your ship. You sail on. .
